message: ...I open my eyes to a world of white.
White ceiling, white walls, white floor.
This isn't the white of Oval Tower.
This is colder. Clinical.
Maybe it's the beeping that makes it feel that way.
I can't move, so I just stare vacantly at the ceiling.
Tubes surround me, piercing my flesh, a swarm of tiny, hungry snakes.
The tests... The tests are endless. I've lost count of how many times they've cut into my body.
The pain was... excruciating, I recall. The memory is distant. I no longer feel anything.
All I have is this white world, empty, cut off.
Here, life and death are the same.
Someone is here.
Probably another scientist in a white coat.
But no. Suddenly, my world fills with color.
In this empty world, he's like a brilliant light, the last ray of the sun that can touch me in this prison.

Those two moles on his chin.<k>
The sight of them fills me with happiness.

name: クリア
message: "Aoba."
He smiles.

name: クリア
message: "We're going to be together now. Toue gave permission. We'll be together forever and ever..."

name: クリア
message: "You belong to me now."
